about.title: Education
about.text: I graduated from the University of South Florida in December 2017 with a B.S. in Computer Engineering, focusing in robotics and IoT. I also worked in two co-op roles as a Technical Writer and Software Engineer at CAE.

about.title: Professional
about.text: After graduation, I started at CAE USA Tampa as an Integration Specialist, before moving into an Avionics Software Engineer role. In 2020, I decided to learn something totally new and dove into Web Development and React.

about.title: Free Time
about.text: My partner and I enjoy traveling, working on our photography and videography, getting out on our paddle boards,  reading by the pool, and relaxing with our pets, Tori, Binny & Nilly.
